short_summary: Acquisition of a digital PCR system
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discoveryposting response deadline closing time and Buyandsellposting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest on December 13, 2022 by 2PM EST. All bids submitted after 2 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) is issuing thisRequest for Proposal for the acquisition, the delivery and the installation of a digital PCR system for St-Jean-sur-Richelieu Research and Development Centre in St-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Quebec, Canada, as detailed in Section 7.
duration_in_months: use also start and end date ?? use Result end_app_start_date and end_app_end_date to calculate alignment
